variables.name: hcl_path_and_file_name
variables.description: String: Relative (to main.tf) or fully qualified path and file name of hcl file.

variables.name: arm_client_id
variables.description: String: Credentials used by packer to create Azure resources.

variables.name: arm_client_secret
variables.description: String: Credentials used by packer to create Azure resources.

variables.name: install_password
variables.description: String: Password used in the Windows Packer vm during installation of software.

variables.name: local_temp
variables.description: String: The toowoxx/packer provider uses a temp folder on the system where Packer is being run.

variables.name: vnet_name
variables.description: String: Name of existing vnet to use.

variables.name: vnet_resource_group
variables.description: String: Resource group containing existing vnet.

variables.name: vnet_subnet
variables.description: String: Name of existing subnet to use.

variables.name: image_base_name
variables.description: String: Base name of new image resource in Azure.

variables.name: image_resource_group_name
variables.description: String: Resource group to contain the new image.

variables.name: vhd_resource_group_name
variables.description: String: Resource group to contain the new vhd.

variables.name: vhd_capture_container_name
variables.description: String: Previously existing storage container in which to capture image as it's being built.

variables.name: vhd_capture_name_prefix
variables.description: String: Prefix of vhd name in storage.

variables.name: vhd_storage_account
variables.description: String: Name of storage account that will receive the vhd.
